{{Infobox dungeon |name = Union Cave |image = [[File:Union Cave.png]] |caption = A map of Union Cave. |tokens = 3000 |location = South of Violet City and the [[Ruins of Alph]], on Route 32. }} '''Union Cave''' is a dungeon in [[Johto]].
==Details==
===Dungeon Stats===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health (Pokémon) !! Base Health (Boss) !! Egg Steps Given |- | General || 63,600 || 260,000 || 6 |}
===Pokémon===
* Ratatta * Sandshrew * Zubat * Geodude * Onix * Goldeen * Magikarp * Wooper (boss)
===Items===
